### rate of increase illustration

from http://socviz.github.io/soc880/snippets/curve-banking.html


```{r}
x <- seq(0, 8, 0.001)
y <- x^4
y1 <- (x^4) + 400

plot(x, y, type="l")
lines(x, y1, type="l")
```
